name: Escort: The Tree's, Grass, and Leaf's Diplomat
summary: Escort Lady Yokimi, Fire Ambassador of Shenrin no Kuni, from the Forest Country border to Konoha. Ensure timely and unharmed arrival; pay is docked for lateness or injuries, and increased for early/perfect delivery. Expect daily attacks from thugs, bandits, mercenaries, and a possible strike from Kusa Shinobi.
details: Lady Yokimi is a high-profile diplomat negotiating between Kusagakure and Konohagakure. She must be escorted from Kusa (1,1) to Konoha via horse-drawn palanquin, arriving within 100 hours (4 days, 26-hour days). Payment is docked -1% per hour late, and -1% per percent HP missing or for injuries. +1% for each hour early, and +10% for perfect health. The palanquin acts as a tent, requires 2-4 carriers, and has DP 50. Horses reduce travel speed. Daily attacks expected. Beware a trio of insurrectionist Kusa Shinobi (Blades of Grass) who may strike at any time.
requirements: Lady Yokimi must arrive unharmed (no HP loss for bonus).
Defend against daily attacks (thugs, bandits, mercenaries).
Beware the Blades of Grass (Kusa no Ken).
rewards: -1% ryō per percent HP missing or for injuries.
notes: Lady Yokimi will always try to dodge before blocking, and only attack if unable to dodge, block, or run.
She stays in the palanquin or near escorts unless forced to run, prioritizing survival and remaining unharmed.
Palanquin: Tent, requires 2-4 carriers, reduces travel speed, holds 2 people or 10 items, DP 50.
Each horse travels at 12MPH, but with palanquin attached, speed is 8MPH.
